languages.text: "Я... оставлю ваше замечание без ответа, {name}. Пока мое подозрение о причинах подобной ремарки не превратилось в нечто более серьезное".

traits.locale_text: "Я... оставлю ваше замечание без ответа, {name}. Пока мое подозрение о причинах подобной ремарки не превратилось в нечто более серьезное".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "I... will let your remark go unanswered, {name}... until evidence arises to confirm my suspicions about your reasons for making it."
languages.original_text: "Я... оставлю ваше замечание без ответа, {name}. Пока мое подозрение о причинах подобной ремарки не превратилось в нечто более серьезное".

traits.locale_text: "I... will let your remark go unanswered, {name}... until evidence arises to confirm my suspicions about your reasons for making it."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I... will let your remark go unanswered, {name}... until evidence arises to confirm my suspicions about your reasons for making it."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I... will let your remark go unanswered, {name}... until evidence arises to confirm my suspicions about your reasons for making it."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I... will let your remark go unanswered, {name}... until evidence arises to confirm my suspicions about your reasons for making it."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我……我就不回答你这样的发言了，{name}……等我找到证据，弄清楚你为什么会这么说，我再答复你吧。”
languages.original_text: "I... will let your remark go unanswered, {name}... until evidence arises to confirm my suspicions about your reasons for making it."

traits.locale_text: “我……我就不回答你这样的发言了，{name}……等我找到证据，弄清楚你为什么会这么说，我再答复你吧。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Voy... a dejar ese comentario sin responder, {name}... por lo menos hasta que tenga pruebas que confirman mis sospechas sobre su motivación al hacerlo».
languages.original_text: "I... will let your remark go unanswered, {name}... until evidence arises to confirm my suspicions about your reasons for making it."

traits.locale_text: «Voy... a dejar ese comentario sin responder, {name}... por lo menos hasta que tenga pruebas que confirman mis sospechas sobre su motivación al hacerlo».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「…その発言は保留にしておこう、{name}さん…あなたがそれを行った理由について、我が疑念を裏付ける証拠が出てくるまで」
languages.original_text: "I... will let your remark go unanswered, {name}... until evidence arises to confirm my suspicions about your reasons for making it."

traits.locale_text: 「…その発言は保留にしておこう、{name}さん…あなたがそれを行った理由について、我が疑念を裏付ける証拠が出てくるまで」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Je... ne répondrai pas à cette remarque, {name}... jusqu'à ce que mes soupçons quant à vos raisons de la faire soient confirmés. »
languages.original_text: "I... will let your remark go unanswered, {name}... until evidence arises to confirm my suspicions about your reasons for making it."

traits.locale_text: « Je... ne répondrai pas à cette remarque, {name}... jusqu'à ce que mes soupçons quant à vos raisons de la faire soient confirmés. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich ... werde nichts zu Eurer Äußerung sagen, {name} ... bis Anhaltspunkte dafür vorliegen, die meinen Verdacht bestätigen, warum Ihr sie so getätigt habt."
languages.original_text: "I... will let your remark go unanswered, {name}... until evidence arises to confirm my suspicions about your reasons for making it."

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... werde nichts zu Eurer Äußerung sagen, {name} ... bis Anhaltspunkte dafür vorliegen, die meinen Verdacht bestätigen, warum Ihr sie so getätigt habt."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "I... will let your remark go unanswered, ... until evidence arises to confirm my suspicions about your reasons for making it."

languages.text: "Ben... Bu sözleri sarf etmenin ardında yatan nedenlere dair kuşkularımı doğrulayacak bir kanıt ortaya çıkana dek... Sözlerini cevapsız bırakacağım {name}."
languages.original_text: "I... will let your remark go unanswered, {name}... until evidence arises to confirm my suspicions about your reasons for making it."
